page.title: 04An Old Lady living in E'bne.
page.content: Isobel is 79 years old and lives at l5a,Bedford Grove. She has lived in Eastbourne for 23 years and is a very kind and helpful old lady. She goes out frequently in a car or bus and loves the Pier and the Bandstand. She likes living in the Upperton area because there are many parks close by and it is easy to get into town. She thinks Eastbourne is clean and that the gardens are beautifully kept, although the pavements are very unsafe. She thought it would be too expensive to repair them. "I use a bus every day" she said. "Bus fares are reasonable and the shops are excellent." She enjoys reading the local newspaper to see if she knows anybody.. {"The {people are the salt of the earth" } said Isobel.
